name: Flying Ship Prototype
description:
This project is my start into programming in a 3D enviroment. Absolutely rough and not polished at all, but it gives an idea what I'm trying. It's barebones, so it just jumps right into the action, there is no menu yet.

Just going to upload latest build from time to time, so subject to HEAVY changes. Let me know if there's any suggestions, fixes or general improvement on how to make the gameplay more fun.
